EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Optimize and Automate your SAP Testing - US/Canada - July 2014.Email -
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our webinar, Optimize and Automate Your SAP Testing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Optimize and Automate Your SAP Testing
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thanks for taking the time to attend our webinar, “Optimize and Automate Your SAP Testing.” We hope you enjoyed it as much as we did. Your participation and engaging questions made all the difference.
If you’re interested in seeing this and other webinars, visit www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts>.
Want to learn more about SAP Testing with Tosca? Here are a few tools to help you learn more about best practices based upon over 50 successful SAP/Tricentis deployments:
- Best Practices Guide: Solving the Top 3 SAP Testing Challenges. Click here <http://innovate.tricentis.com/rs/tricentis/images/best-practices-guide-top-3-sap-challenges.pdf> to download the guide.
- Tosca Testsuite Training Offerings. Sign up for a public training at http://www.tricentis.com/services/education/tosca-public-training <http://www.tricentis.com/services/education/tosca-public-training>.
Best wishes, The Tricentis Webinar Team
David Grassmugg Head of Test Automation and Management Vienna Insurance Group
Michael Hentze Vice President Engineering Tricentis
